modName: Mac intro logo for Skyrim - Must have for Mac users playing Skyrim
summary:
Show that Skyrim on a Mac can be played in style!
<br />
descriptionHtml:
Of course, Skyrim is a Windows only game and the only way to get it working on a Mac is by using a wrapper, (like Wineskin) dual-boot or in software like Virtual Box/Parallels, but I thought it would still be nice to add the text that you are playing the "Apple Edition". It's just appearance, but maybe nice to show off to your friends and make them jealous that they don't have a shiny logo at booting up the game.

[b][i][u]You could help me though by making a .bik version to provide an easier way to use it as in-game logo.[/u][/i][/b]
author: Jelle Zwiers
